name: Cryptbro
description:
Intended to be satirical in nature, the game is from the perspective of a "crypto bro" whos hypocrisies are revealed through dialogue interacting with other users online. After realizing that he had bought in for a much higher price than his friend, he reevaluates his financial decisions by logging off for the day.

By emulating tech spaces (like a browser, log in and homescreen), the game immerses the player in that environment, with the player avatar represented by a cursor.

As this is a linear game, I chose dialog options to be the boolean variable on whether or not the player advances to the next scenes. Likewise, I chose shuffling dialog for one of the online users to express the different views commonly seen about NFTs / crypto currency.
